notFound.subMessage: Don't worry, you can still escape and return to a safe place.

credits.title: Credits

credits.noBishomalosHarmed: No Bishomalos were harmed during the development of this game.

"Yes, I did it all by myself. Any problem?"

effect.fogOfWar: Parts of the map are hidden

results.title: Game Results
results.subtitle: Detailed statistics of your adventure
results.noStatsMessage: But if you haven't played yet, what stats do you want, dear?

instructions.subtitle: Learn to play Hunt the Bishomalo
instructions.objectiveText: Your mission is to explore the cave, find the coin, and escape by returning to the starting cell. It's not mandatory to kill the Bishomalo, but the more you explore, the more secrets you'll discover.
instructions.dangerBishomaloDescription: The fearsome monster lurking in the cave. If you enter its room without an arrow, you will be devoured. You can defeat it with a well-aimed arrow.
instructions.dangerPitsDescription: Deep holes in the ground. If you fall into one, you won't be able to get out and will lose the game. You'll feel a breeze near them.
instructions.noteUnfairGames: The game has unfair elements; there will be deaths you cannot avoid.
instructions.noteArrows: Use arrows cautiously as they are limited.
instructions.noteExplore: Explore every corner to find clues and useful items.

shop.title: Shop
shop.subtitle: Buy items to help you in the next level.
shop.notEnoughGoldMessage: You don't have enough gold. Get out of here before I regret it!
shop.disclaimer1: The shop is not responsible for the misuse of items. Like, I already had maximum hearts... like, I already had a lantern...
shop.disclaimer2: Items cannot be accumulated. We do not refund money.

gameMessages.exitInstruction: To exit, go to the entrance with the coin!

heart.name: Extra Life
heart.description: Gives you one more chance to survive.

shield.name: Shield
shield.description: Protects you from a bishomalo attack.

lantern.name: Lantern
lantern.description: There was already a blackout, who knows if there will be more.

rewind.name: Hourglass
rewind.description: Rewinds time and prevents you from falling to the bottom of a pit.

dragonball.name: A 4-star ball
dragonball.description: I don't really know what it's for, I found it in a bush. I'll give it to you cheap...

apple.name: An apple
apple.description: One is always good for hunger. It will get you out of some trouble.

1.title: The Dark Beginning
1.text: You venture into the depths of the cave, guided only by the dim light of your torch. Shadows seem to move around you, and a strange premonition accompanies you. You don't know what secrets await in the darkness.

2.title: Echoes of the Past
2.text: Among the gloom, you find a body with armor and weapons you vaguely recognize. A sense of guilt begins to grow within you as shadows whisper forgotten names.

3.title: Whispers of Betrayal
3.text: Fragmented memories begin to surface: scenes of betrayal, battles, and the fall of former allies. The cave seems to want to reveal a dark truth you do not wish to face.

4.title: Trail of Vengeance
4.text: As you advance, you notice that the paths are marked by the destruction you have caused. The cave reacts to your presence, becoming more treacherous and difficult.

5.title: The Truth Revealed
5.text: The bodies you've left behind begin to have faces: Lara, Legolas, and Link, your former rivals. The reality of your identity as the Bisho Malo becomes undeniable and heavy.

6.title: Echoes of the Fallen
6.text: The voices of the fallen heroes resonate in the cave, and their spirits seem to watch your every move. The atmosphere grows darker, and the traps more lethal.

7.title: Inner Shadows
7.text: A battle rages within you: the human part that still remains against the darkness that consumes you. The cave seems to reflect this conflict in its twisted formations and increasingly fierce enemies.

8.title: Solitary Path
8.text: You have left everything and everyone behind. Solitude becomes your only companion as you delve into the deepest levels of the cave, where the air grows heavy and dense.

9.title: The Abyss Awaits
9.text: The final boss awaits at the end of this tortuous journey, a dark entity reflecting your soul. The upcoming battle will decide not only your fate but the balance of the entire cave.

10.title: The Recognition
10.text: With each step, you recognize the magnitude of what you have done. The ghosts of the past haunt you, but the determination to finish this journey keeps you steadfast.

11.title: Shadows of the Past
11.text: The echoes of Lara, Legolas, and Link seem to grow stronger, trying to speak to you through the darkness. Their voices are a mixture of warnings and pleas for you to change your path.

12.title: Final Decisions
12.text: Every move is crucial. You feel that the cave itself conspires to stop you, and the final confrontation approaches inexorably.

13.title: The Enemy's Face
13.text: Finally, you see yourself reflected in the dark waters. The most fearsome enemy is the one that dwells within, and the battle against your own shadow is imminent.

14.title: The Last Threshold
14.text: Darkness condenses into a single point: the sanctuary of the final boss. Everything will be decided here, and you must be prepared to face your destiny.

15.title: The Confrontation
15.text: The Bisho Malo rises against its reflection, an epic battle where everything is at stake. The cave trembles before the force of this confrontation, and only one can emerge victorious.

1.title: Explorer in the Depths
1.text: Your adventure begins in the forbidden caves, searching for ancient relics and answers that can save your world. The air is cold, and a sense of danger looms over you.

2.title: Signs in the Darkness
2.text: You find traces of other adventurers: footprints, weapons, and something darker, a presence that disturbs the peace of these forgotten lands.

3.title: Shadows of the Past
3.text: The stories of fallen heroes reach you through the wind and echo. You know the cave holds secrets that could change everything.

4.title: The Whisper of Betrayal
4.text: The walls seem to tell stories of betrayals and lost battles. Each step brings you closer to a truth you'd rather not know.

5.title: The Secret of the Bisho Malo
5.text: You discover that a dark enemy lurks in the shadows, responsible for the disappearance of brave heroes. Its name is a feared whisper everywhere.

6.title: Dangerous Paths
6.text: Traps and dangers increase, and you must be more alert than ever. The cave does not forgive mistakes.

7.title: Light in the Darkness
7.text: A spark of hope illuminates your path as you prepare to face the Bisho Malo and discover the truth behind this nightmare.

8.title: Distant Redemption
8.text: Each step is an attempt to redeem the past and save what remains. The weight of the mission makes you stronger and more determined.

9.title: The Imminent Encounter
9.text: You know that the confrontation with the Bisho Malo is inevitable. The fate of the cave and its secrets depends on your bravery.

10.title: The Revelation
10.text: You discover the identity of the enemy and the connection it has with you and the other fallen heroes. Nothing will be the same from now on.

11.title: Steel Determination
11.text: With renewed courage, you advance through the cave, determined not to let evil triumph.

12.title: The Decisive Moment
12.text: Every arrow and movement counts. The final battle approaches, and you must be ready for it.

13.title: The Last Enigma
13.text: One last intellectual test awaits you: solve the enigma that unlocks the Bisho Malo's chamber.

14.title: Face to Face
14.text: In absolute silence, you enter the enemy's room. Its eyes look at you, awaiting the outcome.

15.title: The Final Judgment
15.text: A battle that will define your legacy. Only one force can leave the cave alive.

1.title: The Guardian of the Forest
1.text: You have felt a disturbance in the winds of the forest. Something evil moves underground. You take your bow and follow the clues to a cave forgotten by time.

2.title: The Silent Betrayal
2.text: You find an arrow like yours, but broken and rusted. You feel that something familiar and dangerous inhabits these depths.

3.title: Shadows That Know Your Name
3.text: The creatures that inhabit the cave seem to recognize you. As if they had fought with you... or against you before. A shiver runs down your spine.

4.title: A Rumor from the Past
4.text: An inscription on the rock describes an elven warrior who was betrayed by a 'being disguised as a hero'. Does it refer to you? Or someone else?

5.title: The Encounter
5.text: You glimpse a figure that seems familiar, but it disappears before you can reach it. It leaves behind a bloodied dagger.

6.title: Hidden Truth
6.text: Pieces of your memory are reconstructed upon finding an old pendant: Lara gave it to you... before disappearing into this very cave.

7.title: The Elf's Wrath
7.text: The knowledge of betrayal rekindles your fury. You move with lethal precision, determined to avenge your friends.

8.title: Memories and Ashes
8.text: You find a makeshift grave. You recognize the hilt of the sword: it belongs to Link. Your heart hardens.

9.title: The Oath
9.text: You promise to eliminate the Bisho Malo, even if it means getting lost in the darkness as your comrades did.

10.title: The Hunter's Eye
10.text: Your concentration is perfect. Every enemy falls before they touch you. But you know the real rival still waits.

11.title: Devastating Truth
11.text: A mural shows you an impossible scene: you, Lara, Link... and the fourth... is it the same one you now seek?

12.title: The Judgment of the Elves
12.text: You question whether vengeance has made you lose your honor. What remains of Legolas if only rage is left?

13.title: Arrow of Destiny
13.text: You find an elven relic: a golden arrow. It can only be used against a worthy foe. Destiny delivers it to you.

14.title: Last Steps
14.text: Each step resonates like a war drum. You feel the fallen accompany you from beyond.

15.title: Vengeance in the Cave
15.text: You reach the heart of the cave. The Bisho Malo awaits you. This is the battle for the honor of the fallen... and for your soul.

1.title: The Hero of Hyrule
1.text: A vision sent by Zelda guides you to a cursed cave. Within lies an evil that must be destroyed before it spreads.

2.title: Shadows of the Past
2.text: Your sword vibrates as you approach the entrance. Something in this cave reminds you of Ganon, but it's not him. It's something more... personal.

3.title: The Echo of Heroes
3.text: You notice signs of an explorer and an elf. Lara? Legolas? Were they here before you?

4.title: A Silent Enemy
4.text: There are no visible monsters, but you feel you are being watched. The darkness moves as if it has a will of its own.

5.title: A Broken Sword
5.text: You find a broken sword with the Hylian shield. It's not yours. A messenger? A previous hero who failed?

6.title: Heart of Courage
6.text: You find a sacred spring that strengthens your determination. The path is hard, but the goal is just.

7.title: The Broken Mirror
7.text: A room full of broken mirrors distorts your figure... in one of them, you see a corrupted version of yourself.

8.title: Zelda's Voice
8.text: A soft voice guides you through a secret passage. It warns you: 'The enemy was an ally... beware of the one who does not remember.'

9.title: Legolas's Last Rest
9.text: You find his empty quiver. His name carved on a stone. His story ends here... or does it?

10.title: Confusion
10.text: Everything seems unreal. Are you following a path that others have already failed to complete? Will you also be a martyr?

11.title: Steps in the Sand
11.text: You follow footprints... until you discover they are yours. You have been here before, but you don't remember when.

12.title: The Ring of Fire
12.text: A test: cross the ring of fire without getting burned. Only one with a pure heart will succeed.

13.title: Shadow with a Name
13.text: The shadow speaks to you. Its voice is yours, but distorted. It doesn't want to fight. It wants to remember.

14.title: Lara's Last Echo
14.text: You find her diary. Last entry: 'The enemy was one of us. It's too late for me now.'

15.title: Path of Light
15.text: You feel the end is near. The ruins glow with a faint light... as if the Triforce itself guides you.

16.title: Hero's Decision
16.text: You will have to decide: redeem the Bisho Malo or destroy it. Future actions will depend on your choice.

17.title: Test of Valor
17.text: A spiritual duel against the essence of the Bisho Malo. Your courage will be the only effective weapon.

18.title: Prelude to the End
18.text: A rest before the end. You find an altar with a new sword... the only one capable of sealing evil.

19.title: The Abyss
19.text: You jump into the heart of the cave, where it all began. You are completely alone. But not defenseless.

20.title: The Last Battle
20.text: The Bisho Malo awaits you. But now you know the truth: it was you who created it. Only by facing your mistake can you restore balance.
